website_summaries.verdict: We love the high-quality ingredients and soothing formula that is safe for irritated skin or even wounds.
pros: Premium ingredients such as natural botanical extracts are safe for animals with sensitive areas
pH-balanced to keep your horse's skin healthy and coat shiny
No harsh detergents, synthetic polymers, or petroleum-based products
Safe and high-quality option for use on many different animals – even cats!
cons: Doesn't address any specific skin issues, but is a solid general-use shampoo

customer_reviews.title: Helped my hair grow quickly after chemo!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo! I ordered it for myself after going through chemo, once my hair started growing back, and it worked great! My hair seemed to grow more quickly and is in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo for Horse and Dog!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this shampoo for years, smelly dogs, hotspots, itching, and an assortment of skin issues - you can not find a better shampoo than this, I even tried it on my mom's psoriasis once, however, it doe say not for human use so I didn't do it again but she said it calmed down the itching. I love the way it smells too- would order this again 100+ times - best pet shampoo on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, cleans gently, and does not leave a residue on the fur
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this equine shampoo on my dogs. I have three Australian Shepherds and one extremely hairy Newfoundland. The soft scent will last for about a week and a half and it does not leave a residue on the fur. I am a repeat buyer of this product because I am extremely happy with it and with four dogs I go through a lot of shampoo. I have gotten compliments at the self-service dog wash on the smell of my dogs shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also use it on Poison Ivy rash and it worked better than what the Doctor told me to use
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time on the dog and myself as well. It works wonders for the itch caused from eczema. Also use it on Poison Ivy rash and it worked better than what the Doctor told me to use. The funny thing is I have been using this on my hair for the past month and when I went to hairdresser to gt my hair colored she asked me what I have been using because my hair is so much softer and healthier than it was 2 months ago. I told her dog shampoo and she told me to keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie M Fuller

customer_reviews.title: ... friend who used to have a dog grooming business recommended this to me for my dog with allergies that ...
customer_reviews.text: A friend who used to have a dog grooming business recommended this to me for my dog with allergies that were affecting her skin. I could not be more pleased... my dog has done better with this product than all the expensive prescription shampoo products my vet prescribed for her! Its all I will use on all my dogs now.
customer_reviews.author: Mama2ladybugs

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, soft and shiny coats, skin soothing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have a mare with itchy, sensitive summer skin and this has worked great for her and my gelding. It had a rich lather that rinsed easily. It left them both extremely soft and shiny. My mare has been much more comfortable with less mane and tail rubbing. She also has less flaky skin around girth and backs of ears. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Em stein

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I have a beautiful Cocker Spaniel who is allergy prone. His skin is sensitive to everything and is often affected by the heat (or food allergies). This shampoo is amazing. I take it with him to his groomer and they even love it. Not only does it make your dog smell good but leaves a soft shiny coat! I use the shampoo and conditioner. I also have the coat moisturizer for in between visits. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: heart4kidz

customer_reviews.title: It a great shampoo for human and pets
customer_reviews.text: It a great shampoo for human and pets. My dog got a sore an her paw and begin to limp. She try to bit us. we decide to soak her paw in warm water and shampoo. She heal in a few days and stop limp at 2 days. pd: use a sock to cover her paw, so she wont lick.
customer_reviews.author: G. Struck

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Shampoo too!
customer_reviews.text: I use this shampoo for my dogs, a couple have allergies. It smells great and it's very healing to irritated skin. I use the MicroTek spray as well. Stops itching and helps heal hot spots.
customer_reviews.author: Paladin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.....
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a mini horse that has itchy neck and tail area. After the first shampooing I noticed he wasn't as itchy. I ordered the spray and hope it works as well. I'll know more after I get a chance to shampoo again and use the spray.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieBean

customer_reviews.title: get product
customer_reviews.text: Have horses in Florida, it is hot and wet. This product helps keep away rain rot and keeps coat nice in the hot summer conditions. Highly recommend this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Anita B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand for years and am never disappointed. Strangers have commented on how soft my horses coats feel after bathing them with Eqyss Micro-Tek. A bit pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Easly

customer_reviews.title: Good Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I use this shampoo on my little Yorkshire Terriers. It really helps with itchy skin and any skin conditions that arise from time to time. It does not do anything for fleas. I like using this in conjunction with the coat rebuilder. The Coat Rebuilder makes conditioner unnecessary. I know that this product says its concentrated, but I don't find it effective if it's diluted, so I just use full strength.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo for any rain rot or fungus! It smells great and makes my horse so soft! I’ve been using it for years and will continue to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shampoo that clears up anything and smells great
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo and the best price I have found. I use it on my horses when they have any skin irritation along with the spray. Seems to clear up anything I have run across and smells great. I use in on my dog, too. All in all a great product that I highly recommend. A mainstay for any horseperson's arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G

customer_reviews.title: Where the F*** is my package???!!!
customer_reviews.text: Im not understanding how my package was handed directly as it supposedly stated, when I checked the apartment office, NO PACKAGE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zenas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo, works very well on a variety of coats and skin issues. Helps to clear up fungus, gives coat a nice sheen, and I have even used it on my dogs.

customer_reviews.title: Harley’s happy
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing product ever. I’ve been giving my dog a bath for six years and this is the first time he’s ever got a good lather

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo

I first bought it because my BC seemed to get hot spots frequently and someone at our local feed store recommended this shampoo and conditioner. Hot spot cleared up very fast once we used it. Plus we always get complements on how good our dogs smell.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: I got tired of going to derm after derm to relieve pimple like bumps all over my scalp
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on myself. I got tired of going to derm after derm to relieve pimple like bumps all over my scalp. After three uses, the bumps are gone and I'm hoping to regain all the hair that I lost due to my scalp condition. It has a pleasant smell and lathers well.

customer_reviews.title: this shampoo is all around fantastic. i am a groomer and its great for ...

customer_reviews.title: Should be EQyss-Canine Shampoo [:
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product and I've been using it for years. However, I don't use it on horses....I use it on DOGS. It is a wonderful product and gentle on the skin, yet gets them clean, leaving the coat shiny and soft. So, don't hold back on using it on the other 4-legged friends out there. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: S. G.

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS GOOD WORKS GOOD
customer_reviews.text: It's always my go to to fight rain rot ....it works if you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is great for dogs with odor issues
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for dogs with odor issues. My boxer suffers from yeast skin infections and the odor is bad. If I bath him twice a month with the Tek shampoo it prevents the yeast from growing back. He also has dermatitis under the chin; I clean it with the shampoo three times a week and it controls the red itchy chin. Also a little shampoo goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: is the best shampoo I've used on my Westie
customer_reviews.text: This, by far, is the best shampoo I've used on my Westie. Anyone who has a Westie knows how challenging it can be to keep his skin clear and coat healthy. This stuff is magic!

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo smells wonderful and works great.
customer_reviews.text: We use this product on our 4 miniature horses before we take them out to events. We are a 501(c)3 and we go to assisted living homes and schools. The minis need to be clean. We use all the Eqyss products.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

Then 15 years ago I started using it myself when I contracted ring worm from a shelter kitty. I always keep a hand soap pump bottle with it in my shower to use myself after I have been grooming the rescues. All my rescued dogs get an Eqyss bath when they first come in. It takes care of bacterial and fungal skin infections. You cannot go wrong with this 'shot gun'(gets them all) shampoo!!
